channel.title: FLF - The Pugcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: UK Public Events - A Pugcast Announcement! [The Pugcast]
item.description:
It’s only a few days till our Pugcast crew heads across the pond and we realized that our public events have been shared over email and social media, but not yet on the podcast. Glenn goes over the details in the update, but here they are again:

 

 

On May 23rd, in conjunction with New Saint Andrew College:

 

6:00pm - 7:00pm Live Pugcast

Oxford Presbyterian Church- 18 St Michael's St, Oxford OX1 2DU, United Kingdom 

7:00- afterparty at the Plough Inn

 

 

On May 26th, rain or shine, the Theology Pugcast will host a Pub Crawl across Oxford, concluding with a live show recording at the Lamb & Flag featuring guest Dr. Alister McGrath.

 

Approximate Pug Crawl schedule:

4:00 Eastgate Hotel

4:45 King's Arms

5:30 White Horse

6:00 Brief moment of silence/selfies at Eagle & Child

6:15 Lamb and Flag for dinner and show

7:00 Live podcast with Alister McGrath

Map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/dK2V8RkrfANEwBqM9

 

Let us know if you’ll make either event (if you haven’t already) via our contact form:

https://thetheologypugcast.com/contact/

 

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Boredom, Nihilism, and Endless Entertainment [The Pugcast]
item.description:
On today's show Tom introduces the topic of boredom and its relation to a world that finds no meaning apart from the endless choices we draw from to gratify and distract ourselves. Glenn and Chris help unpack this timely topic, with its spiritual and historical roots and its impact upon the contemporary church.

 

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/
